person_say: I'm feeling really anxious about my upcoming presentation. How can I calm down and focus on preparing?
animal_say: I understand the anxiety! Bruno, our relaxation bear, can help you find calm. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn some calming techniques from him.
animal_say: Great choice! Let’s go meet Bruno. He’ll share some lovely calming techniques with you!
